page.title: 17MILL HILL/HOLDERS HILL AREA
page.content: Our area is spacious,quiet and very green.About half the neighbourhood is {residential}.There are a few blocks of flats,and the{Army}Barracks,but most {people}live in single family dwellings. Many of the{homes}are rather large and elegant,with beautiful{gardens} and two{cars}parked in the drive.Even the smaller{houses}seem to be well kept,with front{gardens,}displaying many flowers.The{streets}are quite tidy with lots of{trees.} There are only a few{shops}in the vicinity,but there is a primary{school and a{secondary school.} The Great North Way runs through this part of Mill Hill/Hendon,and it is very busy with many{buses,cars and {lorries {}
